column3:
ACK 36c10b9

The files match.

I suggest waiting a few days pending the discussion in that Boost Github issue.

Needs backport.
Backported this to the 0.21 branch in #21860.

Wrong sha256 and it is named boost-boost, and so is the folder.

They say this is going to be the new stable home, ref:
https://github.com/boostorg/boost/issues/502

Sorry for not including this in the first comment.

> Wrong sha256 

I'd say "different", not "wrong" (as it is a different archive format) :)

> They say this is going to be the new stable home, ref:
> [boostorg/boost#502](https://github.com/boostorg/boost/issues/502)

To be [precise](https://github.com/boostorg/boost/issues/502#issuecomment-817954776):
> That should be the stable home; _but we're still working on it_.

Another

True, different sha256. I did not want to suggest a link to a file with a different sha256 for security and trust reasons.

Yes, they are working on it. Bintray is closing, and have scheduled down-time. Next time the 26th. https://jfrog.com/blog/into-the-sunset-bintray-jcenter-gocenter-and-chartcenter/

Getting it from github will require a new sha256 and additional changes to boost.mk.
